title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Urban Transportation Planning Process, Urban Travel and Transportation Systems Characteristics, Travel Demands Forecasting- trip generation, trip distribution, modal split and trip assignment, Transport Behavior of Individuals and House holds, Land use/ Transportation systems, Introduction to Urban Freight Transportation and Urban Mass Transportation Systems.
